0.text: Havent seen you around, are you an explorer? Lookin for them caves?

1.text: You havent!? They are people who came down here and became obsessed with the caves. They worship them and have churches and everything!! I dont know about you but it kinda freaks me out.

opts.text: What?! Thats crazy! Not my kind of thing, I'll keep an eye out for trouble.
Oh really? Thats kinda interesting. I might go and check it out!

2.text: I know! I hope none of them give me any trouble.

3.text: Really?! I mean you do you, but keep me out of it.
